articles.title: Harry Kane takes aim at Arsenal as Tottenham forward celebrates Premier League anniversary - Daily Mail
articles.description: The England captain took part in a Q&A on Twitter to mark the 10th anniversary of his Premier League debut for Spurs, which came in a 2-1 defeat at home to Newcastle on 18 August 2012.
